Nick's Blog

"Nick Gerakines is a certified Erlang badass." -- GitHub Rebase #12

I'm an author, software engineer and dad and occasionally I find time to write about life, the internet and anything else that crosses my mind. I'm a native new-orleanian turned californian and have lived on the west coast since the turn of the century. I love to program, write and spend time with my family.

I'm pretty active on the usual social places including GitHub, del.icio.us, twitter and Facebook. I prefer email over instant messaging but will also respond to Facebook messages.

I fall into the 'hardcore gamer' category and have been know to hang-out on Medivh-US playing the World of Warcraft character Korale. I've been featured on one of WoW Insider's 15 Minutes of Fame as well as a few others. Lately I've been really into Aion Online and even Battlefield 1943. You can get an idea of what I'm up to on my Rupture profile.
